sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO service_point_give_hist (mem_num, service_point_type_id, title_id, give_date, point_end_date, point_amount, created_date, created_user, last_update_date, last_update_user) VALUES (#memNum#, #servicePointTypeId#, #titleId#, #giveDate#, #pointEndDate#, #pointAmount#, #createdDate#, #createdUser#, #lastUpdateDate#, #lastUpdateUser#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT service_point_give_hist.service_point_type_cd, service_point_give_hist.title_id, service_point_give_hist.point_amount, service_point_give_hist.give_date, service_point_give_hist.point_end_date, title_mst.title_name FROM service_point_give_hist LEFT JOIN title_mst ON service_point_give_hist.title_id = title_mst.title_id WHERE service_point_give_hist.mem_num = #value# ORDER BY service_point_give_hist.give_date DESC, service_point_give_hist.title_id
